segments.text: Let's start the interview with some questions . Tell me about yourself and your past experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have 10 years financial industry experience , working for several companies . For the past two years , I have been working in an investment banking . In addition to my analytical mindset , I have a background of solid accounting principles . I am a team player and have great communication and interpersonal skills . I thrive on challenge and work well in high-stress environments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What finance experience have you had that qualifies you for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My background and experience include working on a variety of projects and jobs in the financial industry . Most of my experience has been behind the scenes , doing the calculations . I want to work with clients and continue to grow and be challenged .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you leave your last position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not finding the work as challenging as I used to . I want to find a job that is stimulating , where I can grow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your strengths and weaknesses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One of my strengths is my ability to be flexible . I've seen companies go through many changes in structure and management philosophy . I've had to adjust my style to the new environment several times . As far as weaknesses , I really enjoy my work , and sometimes I put in too much time . But by being aware of my tendency to overwork , I have learned to pace myself more and work less overtime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would your boss describe you and your work style ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She'd say I have a lot of initiative , I see the big picture and I do what has to be done . Second , I always meet deadlines . If I say I'm going to do something , I do it . Lastly , I have the ability to focus on what I'm working on I am not easily distracted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure whatever you offer will be a fair amount for a person with my qualifications . Salary is not the most important factor to me . I'm looking for opportunity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . What do you see as the future trends for the industry ?
segments.speaker: S2
